üß™ Umami Analytics Test Page

1. Check Umami Status

2. Fire Test Events

3. Simulate User Flow

4. Instructions

  1. Click "Check if Umami is Loaded" to verify the script loaded
  2. Fire test events using the buttons above
  3. Open your Umami dashboard: cloud.umami.is
  4. Go to Realtime tab (events appear within 5 seconds)
  5. Or click Events tab to see event list

Note: Page views are tracked automatically. Custom events require clicking the buttons above.
